eu.opends.environment

Class GeoPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.environment.GeoPosition

  • public class GeoPosition
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to convert model coordinates to geo coordinates and vice versa. The given Matrices are specific to the "Stadtmitte am Fluss" model.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      GeoPosition()

      static com.jme3.math.Vector3f geoToModel(Vector3d geoPosition)
      Transforms a position from geo space to the corresponding position in model space.

      Transforms a position from model space to the corresponding position in geo space.

    • Method Detail

      • modelToGeo

        public static Vector3d modelToGeo(com.jme3.math.Vector3f modelPosition)
        Transforms a position from model space to the corresponding position in geo space.
        Parameters:
        modelPosition - Position as vector (x,y,z) in the "Stadtmitte am Fluss" model.
        Returns:
        Position as vector (latitude,longitude,altitude) in the real world.

      • geoToModel

        public static com.jme3.math.Vector3f geoToModel(Vector3d geoPosition)
        Transforms a position from geo space to the corresponding position in model space.
        Parameters:
        geoPosition - Position as vector (latitude,longitude,altitude) in the real world.
        Returns:
        Position as vector (x,y,z) in the "Stadtmitte am Fluss" model.
